labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 x64. Mic is Blue Yeti.
data.actual_result: Game audio sometimes works, microphone sometimes works, sometimes one or the other will fail to send audio. Discord reads as picking up the audio (green circles flash when recieving input, etc), but no audio is heard by others in call.
data.expected_result: Microphone should function and people in call should be able to hear both game audio and microphone audio.
data.short_description: [Master Ticket] No Mic Audio When Streaming Dark Souls Remastered
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a call with 2 or more people - Stream Dark Souls: Remastered - Attempt to speak through your microphone
